item.title: How to upgrade RHEL6 with yum repo of centos
item.description: How to upgrade RHEL6 with yum repo of centos Today I will show you how to setup rhel6 at proxmox VE. After installed REHL6.8,We didn’t have RHEL subscription,but how to get update and install software via yum ? The right answer is to change yum repo. Fix perl error 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 export LANGUAGE=en_US.UTF-8 export LANG=en_US.UTF-8 export LC_ALL=en_US.UTF-8 #locale-gen en_US.UTF-8 cat >> /etc/environment <<EOF LC_ALL=en_US.UTF-8 LANG=en_US.
